reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.reviews: Engaging lectures and challenging assignments. Very knowledgeable in her field.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.reviews: Excellent teacher! Makes complex topics easy to understand. Always available for office hours.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.reviews: Interesting course material, but lectures can be dry at times. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about the subject. Assigns a lot of reading, but it's all relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.reviews: Brilliant instructor. Tough exams, but prepares students well. Great lab sessions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.reviews: Lectures are confusing. Doesn't explain concepts clearly. Strict grading policy.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.reviews: Insightful discussions in class. Encourages critical thinking. Sometimes plays favorites.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable but not the best at explaining. Helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.reviews: Fantastic professor! Engaging lectures and thought-provoking assignments. Very approachable.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.reviews: Clear explanations of difficult concepts. Assignments can be challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.reviews: Passionate about the subject. Lectures can be long-winded. Grading is sometimes inconsistent.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.reviews: Stimulating debates in class. Encourages diverse perspectives. Heavy workload but worthwhile.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.reviews: Inspiring teacher. Makes the subject relevant to current issues. Great field trips.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.reviews: Lectures are hard to follow. Assignments are vague. Not very responsive to emails.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.reviews: Fascinating course content. Professor is enthusiastic and knowledgeable. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.reviews: Good real-world examples in lectures. Sometimes disorganized. Helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.reviews: Exceptional professor! Engaging lectures, interesting assignments, and very supportive.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.reviews: Challenging course but excellent teaching. Professor is patient and explains concepts well.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.reviews: Knowledgeable instructor. Class can be dry at times. Assignments are creative but time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.reviews: Clear explanations of complex topics. Fair exams. Always willing to help during office hours.
